title: Update the Official Port Tariff
description: The port authority has approved a 3% annual increase in port charges. The finance department must update the official tariff document.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current port tariff document.
tasks.expected_outcome: The clerk has the current version of the tariff.

tasks.description: Apply a 3% increase to all service rates listed in the document.
tasks.expected_outcome: All rates are correctly recalculated with the approved increase.

tasks.description: Publish the new tariff on the port's website and notify all customers of the change, effective from the new fiscal year.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new document is uploaded, and a notification is sent to all registered customers.
